typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		JobID as integer,
		ProductionID as string,
		FeatureTitle as string,
		ProjectID as string,
		JobStatus as string,
		Territory as string,
		SpotName as string,
		CampaignName as string,
		ClientName as string,
		EndDate as string,
		Description as string,
		UnitsBilled as string,
		BillingTotal as string,
		Currency as string,
		Version as string,
		Asset as string,
		Format as string,
		Destination as string,
		Length as string,
		Language as string,
		Country as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingSource
source(output(
		ProductionID as integer,
		FeatureTitle as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProduction
StagingSource aggregate(groupBy(ProductionID),
	FeatureTitle = min(FeatureTitle)) ~> Aggregate
Aggregate sort(asc(ProductionID, true)) ~> Sort
Sort, DimProduction exists(toInteger(Aggregate@ProductionID) == DimProduction@ProductionID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exist
Exist derive(ProductionID = toInteger(ProductionID)) ~> toINTProductionID
toINTProductionID sink(input(
		ProductionID as integer,
		FeatureTitle as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> PopulateDIMProduction

source(output(
		JobID as integer,
		ProductionID as string,
		FeatureTitle as string,
		ProjectID as string,
		JobStatus as string,
		Territory as string,
		SpotName as string,
		CampaignName as string,
		ClientName as string,
		EndDate as string,
		Description as string,
		UnitsBilled as string,
		BillingTotal as string,
		Currency as string,
		Version as string,
		Asset as string,
		Format as string,
		Destination as string,
		Length as string,
		Language as string,
		Country as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingSource
source(output(
		ProjectID as integer,
		ClientName as string,
		Currency as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProject
StagingSource aggregate(groupBy(ProjectID,
		Currency),
	ClientName = min(ClientName)) ~> Aggregate
toIntProjectID sort(desc(ProjectID, true)) ~> Sort
Sort, DimProject exists(toIntProjectID@ProjectID == DimProject@ProjectID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exist
Aggregate derive(ProjectID = toInteger(ProjectID)) ~> toIntProjectID
Exist sink(input(
		ProjectID as integer,
		ClientName as string,
		Currency as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> PopulateDIMProject

source(output(
		JobID as integer,
		ProductionID as string,
		FeatureTitle as string,
		ProjectID as string,
		JobStatus as string,
		Territory as string,
		SpotName as string,
		CampaignName as string,
		ClientName as string,
		EndDate as string,
		Description as string,
		UnitsBilled as string,
		BillingTotal as string,
		Currency as string,
		Version as string,
		Asset as string,
		Format as string,
		Destination as string,
		Length as string,
		Language as string,
		Country as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingSource
source(output(
		JobID as integer,
		ProductionID as integer,
		ProjectID as integer,
		JobStatus as string,
		Territory as string,
		SpotName as string,
		Campaign as string,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		Description as string,
		UnitsBilled as decimal(18,0),
		BillingTotal as decimal(18,0),
		Version as integer,
		Asset as string,
		Format as string,
		Destination as string,
		Length as string,
		Language as string,
		Country as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Fact
Join split(isNull(FactJobID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NoMatchOutput, MatchOutput)
StagingSource, SelectJobID join(JobID == FactJobID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join
Fact select(mapColumn(
		FactJobID = JobID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectJobID
ConditionalSplit1@NoMatchOutput derive(ProductionID = toInteger(ProductionID),
		ProjectID = toInteger(ProjectID),
		UnitsBilled = toDecimal(UnitsBilled),
		BillingTotal = toDecimal(BillingTotal),
		Version = toInteger(Version),
		EndDate = toTimestamp(EndDate)) ~> TransformDateType
TransformDateType select(mapColumn(
		JobID,
		ProductionID,
		FeatureTitle,
		ProjectID,
		JobStatus,
		Territory,
		SpotName,
		Campaign = CampaignName,
		ClientName,
		EndDate,
		Description,
		UnitsBilled,
		BillingTotal,
		Currency,
		Version,
		Asset,
		Format,
		Destination,
		Length,
		Language,
		Country,
		FactJobID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RemoveInputDate
RemoveInputDate sink(input(
		JobID as integer,
		ProductionID as integer,
		ProjectID as integer,
		JobStatus as string,
		Territory as string,
		SpotName as string,
		Campaign as string,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		Description as string,
		UnitsBilled as decimal(18,0),
		BillingTotal as decimal(18,0),
		Version as integer,
		Asset as string,
		Format as string,
		Destination as string,
		Length as string,
		Language as string,
		Country as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		JobID,
		ProductionID,
		ProjectID,
		JobStatus,
		Territory,
		SpotName,
		Campaign,
		EndDate,
		Description,
		UnitsBilled,
		BillingTotal,
		Version,
		Asset,
		Format,
		Destination,
		Length,
		Language,
		Country
	)) ~> PopulateFact
ConditionalSplit1@MatchOutput sink(input(
		JobID as integer,
		JobStatus as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		JobID,
		JobStatus
	)) ~> PopulateFactUpdate

activities.name: Parse Territory and ClientName for Country

dependsOn.activity: Parse Territory and ClientName for Country

activities.name: Parse Territory and ClientName for Country

dependsOn.activity: Parse Territory and ClientName for Country
